sentences.english: The voice of the mournful chanter called to dolorous prayer.
sentences.chinese: 哀慟的領唱人的聲音向哀傷的禱告者呼喚。

sentences.english: Because there will no longer be any mourning over sin.
sentences.chinese: 因爲，那時不再因爲罪而哀慟了。

sentences.english: When Queen Esther heard of Mordecai's condition, she couldn't understand it.
sentences.chinese: 王后以斯帖聽聞末底改的哀慟，卻不明所以。

sentences.english: That well-known name awakens all my woes .
sentences.chinese: 此熟悉之名召喚起我所有的哀慟。

sentences.english: Joy and happiness can only be experienced through mourning.
sentences.chinese: 快樂和幸福只有在哀慟中才能體會到。

sentences.english: for ye shall mourn and weep.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你們將要哀慟哭泣。

sentences.english: I'm not talking about mourning versus laughing.
sentences.chinese: 我並沒有說，哀慟和歡笑勢不兩立。

sentences.english: If you smile through your fear and sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 如果你笑着走出恐懼和哀慟。

sentences.english: If only strike through, then less would be mourning.
Conceit will always hinder you from mourning.
sentences.chinese: 自負總是會阻止你表達你的哀慟。

sentences.english: The road to joy and rejoicing is through mourning.
sentences.chinese: 必須通過哀慟，纔能有喜樂和歡愉。

sentences.english: Mourning, in any of its forms, is familiar to most of us.
sentences.chinese: 無論是哪種形式的哀慟，大多數人都很熟悉。
